results.name: Number T(n,k) of compositions of n where the difference between largest and smallest parts equals k; triangle T(n,k), n>=1, 0<=k<n, read by rows.
comment: For fixed k > 0, limit_{n->infinity} T(n,k)^(1/n) = d, where d > 1 is the real root of the equation d^(k+2) - 2*d^(k+1) + 1 = 0. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 07 2019
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..150, flattened
maple: b:= proc(n, k, s, t) option remember;
b:= proc(n, s, t) option remember; `if`(n=0, x^(t-s),
add(b(n-j, min(s, j), max(t, j)), j=1..n))
mathematica: b[n_, k_, s_, t_] := b[n, k, s, t] = If[n < 0, 0, If[n == 0, 1, Sum [b[n-j, k, Min[s, j], Max[t, j]], {j, Max[1, t-k+1], s+k-1}]]]; A[n_, k_] := A[n, k] = If[n == 0, 1, Sum[b[n-j, k+1, j, j], {j, 1, n}]]; T[n_, k_] := A[n, k] - If[k == 0, 0, A[n, k-1]]; Table[Table[T[n, k], {k, 0, n-1}], {n, 1, 15}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 15 2014, translated from Maple *)
